body:
Hi folks,


Just a quick note to let you know we have posted a couple of short videos
showing off the new Radiance "one click" functionality that was recently
added to OpenStudio (as of v0.9.0). You can access them in line with this
playlist link:


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LAvhO777pPU&list=PLPk2tlcZM0gwMRQ7gvNddCS5HP
MgzJOU3&index=4&feature=plpp_video




Some social media things don¹t play well with links to a playlist,
however; here are the direct video links to both videos.


1 of 2
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LAvhO777pPU


2 of 2
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IXnL6W8kXxQ




Thanks!


- Rob




Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
